trans-unit.source: Contains information about the content type (such as currency, date, or address) or language construct that determine how text should be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre o tipo de conteúdo (como moeda, data ou endereços) ou a construção de idioma que determinam a forma como o texto deve ser ditas.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the `SayAs` class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do `SayAs` classe.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> class are used to get or set the values for the attributes of the `say-as` element in SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>classe são utilizados para obter ou definir os valores para os atributos do `say-as` elemento na marcação SSML.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A> property uses a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> instance to inform the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> how to speak the text contained in the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>propriedade utiliza uma <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>instância para informar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>como fale o texto contido na <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the `detail` attribute for a `say-as` element in the SSML markup language of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da `detail` atributo para um `say-as` elemento no idioma SSML markup de uma linha de comandos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property gets or sets the value for the Detail property in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>obtém ou define o valor para a propriedade de detalhe na propriedade um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the `format` attribute for a `say-as` element in the SSML markup language of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da `format` atributo para um `say-as` elemento no idioma SSML markup de uma linha de comandos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property gets or sets the value for the Format property in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade obtém ou define o valor para a propriedade de formato num <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, a prompt may contain the phrase “The time is `<say-as interpret-as=”time”> 05:00 </say-as>`”.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, numa linha pode conter a frase "a hora é `<say-as interpret-as=”time”> 05:00 </say-as>`".

trans-unit.source: In this example, `05:00` could be spoken as ”five o’clock” or “five AM” or “oh five hundred”.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, `05:00` foi ser ditas como "cinco o'clock" ou "cinco AM" ou "Esqueceu QUINHENTAS".

trans-unit.source: The Format property allows the value of the `interpret-as` attribute to be extended to specify which time format to speak.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de formato permite que o valor da `interpret-as` atributo ser expandido para especificar qual o formato de hora fale.

trans-unit.source: If the value for the `interpret-as` attribute is “time:24hour”, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> speaks “oh five hundred”.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor para o `interpret-as` atributo é "Hora de tempo:&24;", o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>speaks "Esqueceu QUINHENTAS".</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: If the value for the `interpret-as` attribute is “time:12hour”, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> speaks “five A M”.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor para o `interpret-as` atributo é "Hora de tempo:&12;", o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>speaks "cinco A M".</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the `interpret-as` attribute for a `say-as` element in the SSML markup language of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da `interpret-as` atributo para um `say-as` elemento no idioma SSML markup de uma linha de comandos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property gets or sets the value for the InterpretAs property in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>obtém ou define o valor para a propriedade InterpretAs na propriedade um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses the content type indicated by the InterpretAs property to determine how to render specified text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>utiliza o tipo de conteúdo indicado pela propriedade InterpretAs para determinar como apresentar o texto especificado.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, the name Edgar could be spoken as a name: “My name is Edgar”.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome pode ser ditas Edgar como um nome: "o meu nome é Edgar".

trans-unit.source: Or it could be spelled out with letters, as specified with the `interpret-as` attribute in this sentence: “My name is `<say-as interpret-as=”spell-out”> Edgar </say-as>`.”
trans-unit.target: Ou pode ser escrito com letras, tal como especificado com o `interpret-as` atributo nesta frase: "o meu nome é `<say-as interpret-as=”spell-out”> Edgar </say-as>`."

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> speaks Edgar as “E D G A R”.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>speaks Edgar como "I D G R de um".</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
